code: import cartTypes from"./cart.types";export var toggleCartVisibility=function toggleCartVisibility(){return{type:cartTypes.TOGGLE_CART_VISIBLE};};export var addCartItem=function addCartItem(item){return{type:cartTypes.ADD_CART_ITEM,payload:item};};export var reduceCartItem=function reduceCartItem(item){return{type:cartTypes.REDUCE_CART_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeCartItem=function removeCartItem(item){return{type:cartTypes.CLEAR_CART_ITEM,payload:item};};
